de.spricom.dessert.assertions

Class SliceAssert

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.spricom.dessert.assertions.SliceAssert

  • public class SliceAssert
extends Object
    Implements a DSL for slice assertions using a fluent API.

      SliceAssert isLayeredStrict()
